727417f-a.title: Queens: Metropolitan Avenue - 62nd Street
727417f-a.text:
Metropolitan Avenue (formerly numbered from fore to back-
ground 1643 to 1633), north side, west from 64th Street, to 62nd
Street. In the center of the view are two peaked roof structures
erected in 1885 and 1891 respectively and known as Charles Langen's
Hotel.
1922
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
